S02grahmdhu:3_2: tadyathā - vajrapāṇinā ca nāma bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S02grahmdhu:4_0: evaṃ pramukhair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S02grahmdhu:4_1: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ [Gmdh_172] suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaparyavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
S02grahmdhu:4_3_0: atha khalu vajrapāṇir bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tat parṣanmaṇḍalam avalokyāsanād utthāya svaṛddhyādhiṣṭhānena bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ
S02grahmdhu:4_3_1: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇamya purato niṣadya sagarveṇa paryaṅkam ābhujya līlayā tat parṣanmaṇḍalam avalokya vajrāñjalī svahṛdaye
S02grahmdhu:4_4: grahāś ca bhagavann ugrānugrarūpāś ca raudrāraudrarūpās ca krūrākrūrarūpāś ca sattvān viheṭhayanti /
S02grahmdhu:4_5: keṣāñcit prāṇam apaharanti keṣāñcid upadravāś ca kurvanti keṣāñcid ojohārāṃś ca kurvanti keṣāñcid dravyam apaharanti keṣāñcid dīrghāyuṣsattvānām alpāyuṣaṃ kurvanti /

S02grahmdhu:7_1_1: divyapūjābhiḥ pūjayitvā praṇamya jānubhir nipatya kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhūtvā bhagavantam etad avocan*

S02grahmdhu:8_2: guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhanaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kuryāmaḥ /

S02grahmdhu:10_0: pūrvasyāṃ diśi raktakamalopari priyaṅgugandhamaṇḍalake somo brāhmaṇa iti jñeyaṃ sitavarṇaṃ jaṭāmukuṭapuṣpāvasaktaṃ bhojanaghṛtodanaṃ śrīvāsadhūpaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:11_0_0: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śuklakamalopari candanagandhamaṇḍalake bhikṣurūpo maṅgalo raktavarṇo ratnamakuṭo vāme śakti dakṣiṇe varadahasto
S02grahmdhu:11_0_1: bhojanam asya kṣīrabhojanaṃ bhāṣabhaktaṃ vā gugguladhūpaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:12_0: paścimāyām diśi raktapadmopari kṛṣṇāgarugandhamaṇḍalake brahmacārī budhaḥ syāt pītavarṇo raktaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:12_1: bhojanaṃ mudrabhāṣakṛṣaraḥ / dhūpo gandharasaḥ / oṃ rājaputrapītavarṇāya namaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:13_0: uttarasyāṃ diśi sitakamalopari devadārugandhamaṇḍalake parivrājako gurus taptakāñcanavarṇābho raktaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:14_1: āgneyāṃ diśi raktapadmopari candanagandhamaṇḍalake śukrapāśupatadhāri gokṣīravarṇadhavalāmbho jaṭāmukutākṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
S02grahmdhu:14_3: oṃ namaḥ śukrādhipataye asurottamāya śuddhavigrahe svāhā /
S02grahmdhu:15_0: nairṛtyāṃ diśi sitapaṅkajopari nīlacandanagandhamaṇḍalake śaniścaro kṛṣṇavarṇaphaṇabhṛtkṣapaṇako jñeyaḥ bījajaṭāmukuṭaśmaśruḥ /
S02grahmdhu:16_0_0: vāyavyāṃ diśi raktāmbhojopari tagarādigandhamaṇḍalake kāpāliko rāhu rājāvartanibho 'rdhadeho ravirathabhayānakalocanayugo
S02grahmdhu:16_1: asya deyaṃ bhāṣāmiṣabhojanaṃ tilakṛṣaro vā vilvapatradhūpaḥ /

S02grahmdhu:17_2: asya deyaṃ bhojanaṃ dhṛtapūrakaṃ sajjaraso dhūpaḥ /

S02grahmdhu:18_1: pūrvottarakoṇe sarve grahāḥ pūrvadakṣiṇakoṇe sarve rāśinakṣatrāḥ dakṣiṇapaścimakoṇe sarvopadravāḥ paścimottarakoṇe bhaṭṭārikā mahāvidyā /
S02grahmdhu:18_2: śvetā nīlāruṇatrimukhā hastadvayena vyākhyānamudrā dakṣiṇe ratnachatrā vāme pāśaśaktidharā ratnamukuṭīvajraparyaṅkopaviṣṭā candāsanasamāsīnā ṣoḍaśavarṣākārā sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā /
